street_special_desig_code.description:
Max length 100 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

special_desig_location_text.description:
Max length 255 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

special_desig_description.description:
Max length 255 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

proposed_start_time.description:
Required if work_type is immediate
proposed_start_time is required if proposed_start_date is in the past

proposed_end_date.description:
proposed_end_date must be on or after proposed_start_date
If work_type = planned, the maximum date range between proposed_start_date and proposed_end_date is 5 years

proposed_end_time.description:
proposed_end_time is required if proposed_end_date is in the past
proposed_end_time must be after the date and time for proposed_start_time

excavation.description: Whether an excavation will be required

permit_conditions.description:
Array values must be unique
See business rule ref. 1.11 - Permit conditions

collaboration_details.description:
Required if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

collaborative_works.description:
Optional but only saved if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

early_start_pre_approval.description: See business rule ref. 1.9 - Early start

pre_approval_details.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 500 characters

pre_approval_authoriser.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 100 characters

early_start_reason.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = false
Max length 500 characters

file_ids.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

permit_status.description:
Can only be set to granted_proposed, refused, cancelled, revoked_proposed, or revoked_in_progress
See business rule ref. 6.1 - Revoking a permit
See business rule ref. 7.1 - Cancelling a permit before assessment
See business rule ref. 10.1 - Permit Status

additional_comments.description:
Required if permit_status = refused
Max length 500 characters

assessment_discount.description:
Required if permit_status = granted_proposed or granted_with_changes
Is whole number between 0 and 100 inclusive

revoke_reason.description:
Required if permit_status = revoked_proposed or revoked_in_progress
Max length 500 characters

work_reference_number.description:
Max length 24 characters
Must be unique in the system

proposed_start_time.description: proposed_start_time is required if proposed_start_date is in the past

proposed_end_date.description:
proposed_end_date must be on or after proposed_start_date
If work_type = planned, the maximum date range between proposed_start_date and proposed_end_date is 5 years

proposed_end_time.description:
proposed_end_time is required if proposed_end_date is in the past
proposed_end_time must be after the date and time for proposed_start_time

excavation.description: Whether an excavation will be required

permit_conditions.description:
Array values must be unique
See business rule ref. 1.11 - Permit conditions

street_name.description:
Max length 100 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

area_name.description:
Max length 100 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

usrn.description:
Is whole number between 1000001 and 99999999 inclusive
See business rule ref. 1.12 - USRN

highway_authority.description:
Max length 100 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

road_category.description: Is whole number between 0 and 4 inclusive

works_coordinates.description: Must be a GeoJSON geometry (using British National Grid easting and northing coordinate pairs) and must be a point, line string or polygon

collaboration_details.description:
Required if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

collaborative_works.description:
Optional but only saved if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

file_ids.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

early_start_pre_approval.description: See business rule ref. 1.9 - Early start

pre_approval_details.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 500 characters

pre_approval_authoriser.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 100 characters

early_start_reason.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = false
Max length 500 characters

workstream_prefix.description: Must consist of 3 positive whole numbers

actual_start_date.description:
actual_start_date must be in the past
Must be after proposed start date
Permit must be granted

actual_stop_date.description:
actual_stop_date must be in the past
Must be after actual start date
Permit must be in progress

excavation_carried_out.description:
Permit must be in progress or closed
There are no reinstatements submitted for the permit

inspection_units.description:
Is whole number between 1 and 999 inclusive
Permit must be in progress or closed
Can only add inspection_units if an excavation was carried out
Can only add inspection_units if the permit is in progress or closed

final_reinstatement.description: Whether it is a final reinstatement

inspection_start_date.description: inspection_start_date must be in the past

inspection_category.description: See business rule ref. 3.2 - Inspection category

inspection_outcome.description: See business rule ref. 3.3 - Inspection outcome

defect_details.description:
Required if inspection_outcome = failed_low or failed_high
Max length 500 characters

unable_to_complete_details.description:
Required if inspection_outcome = unable_to_complete_inspection
Max length 500 characters

was_call_logged.description: Required if inspection_outcome = failed_low or failed_high and inspection_type = slg

call_logged_to.description:
Required if was_call_logged = true
Max length 100 characters

call_logged_summary.description:
Required if was_call_logged = true
Max length 500 characters

defect_fixed_on_site.description: Required if inspection_outcome = failed_low or failed_high and inspection_type = slg

additional_failure_comments.description:
Required if inspection_outcome = failed_low, failed_high, withdraw_defect or further_inspections_required
Max length 500 characters

inspection_evidence.description: Required if inspection_outcome = failed_low, failed_high, withdraw_defect or further_inspections_required

file_ids.description:
Required if inspection_evidence = true
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

reinspection_date.description:
Optional if inspection_outcome = failed_low, failed_high, withdraw_defect or further_inspections_required
Date must occur today or a date in the future

reinspection_date_time.description:
Optional if inspection_outcome = failed_low, failed_high, withdraw_defect or further_inspections_required
The date for reinspection_date_time must match the date for reinspection_date
Time must occur today or a date in the future

username.description:
Max length 50 characters
Should be populated with the user creating the inspection

reinstatement_status.description: See business rule ref. 4.4 - Making interim site permanent

reinstatement_date.description:
reinstatement_date must be in the past
Must be after actual start date
Must be before actual end date (if entered)

depth.description: Is number between 0.01 and 99.99 inclusive, to two decimal places

length.description: Is number between 0.01 and 9999.99 inclusive, to two decimal places

width.description: Is number between 0.01 and 99.99 inclusive, to two decimal places

reinstatement_coordinates.description: Must be a GeoJSON geometry (using British National Grid easting and northing coordinate pairs) and must be a point, line string or polygon

location_types.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values

reinstatement_evidence.description: Whether reinstatement evidence has been supplied

file_ids.description:
Required if reinstatement_evidence = true
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

inspection_units.description:
Is whole number between 1 and 999 inclusive
Permit must be in progress or closed
Can only add inspection_units if an excavation was carried out
Can only add inspection_units if the permit is in progress or closed

final_reinstatement.description: Whether it is a final reinstatement

fpn_evidence.description: Whether FPN evidence has been supplied

file_ids.description:
Required if fpn_evidence = true
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

offence_date.description: offence_date must be in the past

status_reason.description:
Required if FPNStatus = withdrawn or disputed
Optional if FPNStatus = accepted
Max length 500 characters

topic.description: Only highway authorities can comment with the topic OVERRUN

Required if work_type is immediate
proposed_start_time is required if proposed_start_date is in the past

proposed_end_date.description:
proposed_end_date must be on or after proposed_start_date
If work_type = planned, the maximum date range between proposed_start_date and proposed_end_date is 5 years

proposed_end_time.description:
proposed_end_time is required if proposed_end_date is in the past
proposed_end_time must be after the date and time for proposed_start_time

permit_conditions.description:
Array values must be unique
See business rule ref. 1.11 - Permit conditions

collaboration_details.description:
Required if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

collaborative_works.description:
Optional but only saved if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

early_start_pre_approval.description: See business rule ref. 1.9 - Early start

pre_approval_details.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 500 characters

Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 100 characters

early_start_reason.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = false
Max length 500 characters

file_ids.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

alteration_status.description: Can only be set to granted, refused or granted_with_duration_challenge

assessment_comments.description:
Required if alteration_status = refused or granted_with_duration_challenge
Max length 500 characters

assessment_discount.description:
Required if alteration_status = granted
Is whole number between 0 and 100 inclusive

reasonable_period_end_date.description:
Required if alteration_status = granted_with_duration_challenge
Must be on or after the permit proposed_end_date and before the alteration updated proposed_end_date

file_ids.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information
